exportMnemonicDialog.title: Your secret phrase
exportMnemonicDialog.description: This is your secret (recovery) phrase. It proves wallet ownership, never disclose it to anyone. Write it on paper and store in a safe place. If you lose device or reinstall wallet, you would need it.

menu.recoveryDescription:
The recovery phrase proves wallet ownership, never disclose it to anyone. 

If you lose your recovery phrase, even Humaniq will not be able to get your resources back.
menu.recoveryPhraseDescription:
Write these words in the right order on paper and store in a safe place. 
If you lose device or reinstall wallet, you would need it.
menu.recoveryPhraseWarning: Never share your recovery phrase with anyone, store it securely!

walletConnect.title: Wallet connect
walletConnect.info: WalletConnect feature allows to use this Humaniq wallet with an app on another device. To connect:

exitDialog.title: Have you secured your recovery phrase
exitDialog.description: Without this you will not be able to recover your account or sign back
